panels.visual: Val crossing finish line Sled shooting sparks everywhere **Sound EFFECTS:** "ZZZZAP!"
Sorrel (halfling child) at finish line, eyes wide
panels.dialogue: Sorrel: "Oh wow! That's a really fast sled! Can I use it for the next run?" Val: "Uh... sure, kid."

panels.visual: Malrik collecting winnings Passing gold to Prismor secretly
panels.dialogue: Gambler: "Funny things happening with the essences these days..." Malrik (thought): "Funnier than you know."  ## CHAPTER 4: THE BALCONY GARDEN
Pocky: "Something's sabotaging the essences. We need to investigate." Lunara: "Marivielle at the garden café mentioned strange visitors..."
